abstract: A frenzy of speculation about a teenager's identity has gripped South Korean this week as reporters scour the Internet for clues connecting him to North Korea's Kim Jong-il.
snippet: A frenzy of speculation about a teenager's identity has gripped South Korean this week as reporters scour the Internet for clues connecting him to North Korea's Kim Jong-il.
lead_paragraph: The sharply dressed 17-year-old might be any fashionable South Korean teenager: bleached blond hair, an earring and a necklace with a cross-shaped pendant.

headline.main: Web Postings Stir Interest in Teenager's Relation to North Korean Leader
